0.1: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
0.0: Peace be with you, ministering angels, messengers of the Most High,
0.3: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
0.2: Come in peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
0.5: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
0.4: Bless me with peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
0.7: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
0.6: Go in peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
